title: Why is this job a good fit for me?

analysis.title: Relevant Experience
analysis.description: You have substantial experience as a UI/UX Designer, Interaction Designer, and User Research Specialist. Your role at Sohu aligns with designing interaction elements relevant to user experience design for digital products.

analysis.title: Seniority
analysis.description: You have amassed over eight years of relevant experience, meeting the mid-level seniority requirement for the role.

analysis.title: Education
analysis.description: While you hold a Master's degree from Politecnico di Milano in Digital and Interaction Design, it doesn't strictly align with the specified fields of Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or Information Science and Technology required by the job.

title: Why is this job a good fit for me?

analysis.title: Technical Expertise
analysis.description: Your experience with network infrastructure, cloud platforms, and distributed systems directly aligns with the core requirements for this Software Engineer role.

analysis.title: Experience Level
analysis.description: Your 8+ years in software engineering with focus on infrastructure places you well within the senior engineer bracket for this position.

analysis.title: Team Collaboration
analysis.description: Your proven track record working across teams and mentoring junior engineers demonstrates the collaborative skills needed for this role at Cursor AI.

title: Why is this job a good fit for me?

analysis.title: Foundational Knowledge
analysis.description: Your background in software development provides a solid foundation for transitioning into this product management role.

analysis.title: Industry Experience
analysis.description: While you have relevant experience, your background is more technical than product-focused. Some transition training may be beneficial.

analysis.title: Growth Opportunity
analysis.description: This role presents an excellent opportunity to leverage your technical expertise while developing product strategy and business acumen.
